summary: In Czarist Russia, around 1911, a Russian-Jewish handyman, Yakov Bok (Sir Alan Bates), is wrongly imprisoned for a most unlikely crime.
cast: Alan Bates|Dirk Bogarde|Georgia Brown|Hugh Griffith|Elizabeth Hartman|Ian Holm|David Opatoshu|David Warner|Carol White|George Murcell|Murray Melvin|Peter Jeffrey|Michael Goodliffe|Thomas Heathcote|Mike Pratt|Stanley Meadows|Francis De Wolff|David Lodge|William Hutt|Imre Antal|Michael Balfour|Alfie Bass|Helen Dowling|Danny Green|Sylvana Henriques|Oliver MacGreevy|Roy Sone|Norbert Viszlay
title: El hombre de Kiev
